channel.title: What other animal are we closely related to than primates
channel.description:
What other animal are we closely related to than primates.
i already know we are closely related to primates, but other than them what else?

item.title: What other animal are we closely related to than primates
item.dc:creator: @SETO SETO
item.description:
@SETO wrote:

well, the answer, biologically we are related to mice,hamster,Guinea pig,

thats y we experiment on them

Read full topic

item.title: What other animal are we closely related to than primates
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“la­wl, post:37, topic:338931”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=435316.msg3198945#msg3198945 date=1273107044]

c’mon supose to be serious,

Honestly, id say anything that has the ability to walk on 2 legs. Dolphins are supposed to be the most intelligent animal, so that could work also.

dolphins are fishes idiot… how could we be related to fish…

Fishes is not a word unless you use it in the verb form, which you didn’t, “idiot…”
[/quote]
wow[/quote]
yawow

[quote=“Frell, post:38, topic:338931”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=435316.msg3198945#msg3198945 date=1273107044]

c’mon supose to be serious,

Honestly, id say anything that has the ability to walk on 2 legs. Dolphins are supposed to be the most intelligent animal, so that could work also.

dolphins are fishes idiot… how could we be related to fish…

Fishes is not a word unless you use it in the verb form, which you didn’t, “idiot…”
[/quote]
gtfo before i fish u[/quote]
Makes not an ounce of sense, sir.
